name: Bye-Bye Bunnies
description:
This is a silly little game about cuboid bunnies that explode if you hit them too hard.
there is no difficulty involved, you have unlimited ammo, god mode etc. This is more about chilling out and throwing stupid little cube idiots at the wall and watching them go boom :^)

There are many different bunnies to find and destroy, such as:
- Beyblade Bunny
- Initial D Bunny
- Obi-wan Kenobunny
- Soviet Bunny
- and a few more :^)
some of them have unique behavior and interactions with one another too...
